newsitem.title: USA: Staples, Office Depot holders approve merger.
newsitem.headline: Staples, Office Depot holders approve merger.

text.p: Staples Inc and Office Depot Inc said Wednesday their shareholders had approved the proposed $4 billion merger of the two companies.
Separate shareholder votes were held earlier today -- for Staples in Boston, and for Office Depot in Delray Beach, Fla.
The Federal Trade Commission is seeking to block the merger, contending it would raise office supply prices.
The companies signed a definitive merger pact in September.
Staples operates 604 office products superstores in over 100 markets across the United States and Canada, 40 stores in the UK and 16 in Germany.
Office Depot operates 575 stores in North America, including 529 superstores.
